title: Drawing, "Lady shopper returning home", 1935
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: Woman coming up tenement steps with two bags of groceries and food. Two sullen-looking boys and small girl seated on railing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady shopper returning home", 1935.
1935. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-30.
